channel.title: Intoxica Radio w/Howie Pyro
channel.description: Howie Pyro plays the weird stuff......50's and 60's rock and roll, psycho surf, garage, rockabilly, hillbilly horrors, voodoo r & b, insane instrumentals, religious nuts, teenage hell music, vintage global garbage, peppered with bizarre old movie ads & radio clips & general echo-fied screaming...
channel.itunes:subtitle: Every Tuesday at 9:00pm on luxuriamusic.com
channel.itunes:author: Intoxica Radio
channel.itunes:summary: Howie Pyro plays the weird stuff......50's and 60's rock and roll, psycho surf, garage, rockabilly, hillbilly horrors, voodoo r & b, insane instrumentals, religious nuts, teenage hell music, vintage global garbage, peppered with bizarre old movie ads & radio clips & general echo-fied screaming...

item.title: INTOXICA IS BACK! PLEASE SEE MESSAGE-Intoxica Radio w/Howie Pyro 4-10-12SPECIAL GUEST REVEREND BEAT-MAN!
item.description: Intoxica Radio w/Howie Pyro 4-10-12SPECIAL GUEST REVEREND BEAT-MAN! ALWAYS A GREAT GUEST SWISS WILDMAN REV. BEAT-MAN FROM SO MANY GREAT BANDS & VOODOO RHYTHM RECORDS!!! I HAVE HAD A BUNCH OF GLITCHES HERE ON THE WEBSITE AND THEY ARE ALL CLEARED UP NOW...IF YOU HAVE BEEN TRYING TO DOWNLOAD SHOWS & BEEN GETTING THE DEFAULT MESSAGE I'M VERY SORRY!!! ALL THE PROBLEMS HAVE BEEN DEALT WITH & ALL IS BACK TO "AB"NORMAL HERE IN INTOXICA LAND!!! ENJOY, STAY SICK & RETARDED! HOWIE PYRO
item.dc:creator: Intoxica Radio
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: Intoxica Radio w/Howie Pyro 3-27-12 STUDIO HIJINX
item.description: A MESSAGE TO INTOXICA LISTENERS HEY, SORRY FOR ALL THIS CONFUSION...I WILL HAVE THESE PODOMATIC GLITCHES SORTED OUT SOON WITH ALL MY NEW PODCASTS...HANG IN THERE!!! original caption below: WE HAVE A WHOLE NEW SYSTEM BEING INSTALLED THANKS TO YOUR DONATIONS & I WENT IN EARLY TO WORK OUT SOME OF THE BUGS...WE EDITED OUT THE WORST ONES (THANKS TO GARY SCHNEIDER FROM OPENMYNDCOLLECTIBLES.COM). THANKS TO HAUNTED GEORGE FOR THE COOL ART!
item.dc:creator: Intoxica Radio
